scripts.pack:css:download: npm run pack:css:download:roboto & npm run pack:css:download:raleway
scripts.pack:css:vendor: cat vendor/bootstrap/css/bootstrap.min.css vendor/google-roboto.css vendor/google-raleway.css vendor/owl-carousel/owl.carousel.css vendor/owl-carousel/owl.theme.css vendor/owl-carousel/owl.transitions.css vendor/magnific-popup/magnific-popup.css vendor/formstone/background.css vendor/animate.css/animate.min.css > vendor/all.css
